Package org.schwering.evi.util

Interface Summary
IHTMLPaneListener Listens for address events in a HTMLPane.
 

Class Summary
Base64 Base64 implementation.
EnvironmentPanel A panel which contains a scrollable table with the environment information.
ExceptionDialog Displays a frame with information about a thrown exception.
HTMLBrowser A HTMLPane with a 'Home' and 'Back' button.
HTMLPane A simple HTML frame with hyperlinks and simple history.
MemoryPanel A JPanel that shows frequently updated memory information.
Messages Provides access to externalized strings.
RightClickMenu Represents a standard right click menu for textcomponents.
Util Provides some GUI utilities.
 

Exception Summary
LookAndFeelException Base module exception.
